ti:work.ti:title: Non Posse Suaviter Vivi Secundum Epicurum

ti:translation.ti:label: That it is Not Possible to Live Pleasurably According to the Doctrine of Epicurus
ti:translation.ti:description: Plutarch. Plutarch's Morals, Vol. II. Goodwin, William W., editor; Baxter, William, translator. Boston: Little, Brown, and Company; Cambridge: Press of John Wilson and Son, 1874.

ti:edition.ti:label: Ὅτι οὐδ' ἡδέως ζῆν ἔστι κατ' Ἐπίκουρον
ti:edition.ti:description: Plutarch. Plutarchi Chaeronensis Moralia, Vol VI. Vernardakēs, Grēgorios N., editor. Leipzig: Teubner, 1895.
